Racheal Njoroge bụ onye ọkachamara IT nke Kenya, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke mpaghara South Africa nke Cummins, nke dabeere na Johannesburg, South Africa, dị irè n'ubochi 1 September 2018
N'ikike a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ azụmahịa na mba ofesi na South Africa, Angola, Botswana, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Swaziland, Zambia na Zimbabwe.
A mụrụ Racheal Njoroge na Kenya

O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na sistemu njikwa njikwa, sitere na Winona State University, na Winona, Minnesota, United States, nwetara na 2002.   Nzere ya nke Master of Business Administration, na-elekwasị anya na azụmaahịa bụ Miller College of Business, na Mahadum Ball State, na Muncie, Indiana, na United States, na 2006.
N'ime otu afọ na ọkara, Nwada Njoroge rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na usoro nkwukọrịta na Madison Insurance Kenya Limited, nke dị na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya, ruo Disemba 2004
O jiri ọnwa iri na asatọ sochiri ya rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ
na Bureau of Business Research nke University Computing Services nke Ball State University, dabere na Muncie, Indiana, United States, ruo Mee 2006.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na nchịkwa azụmahịa, Cummins goro ya n'ọrụ, na Mee 2006, buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ha na Columbus, Indiana, United States, dị ka IT Intern
Mgbe obere oge gasịrị na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara South Africa, Njoroge laghachiri na Columbus wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nyocha usoro maka afọ atọ na-esote
A kwaliteziri ya ka ọ bụrụ Strategy IT & Planning Leader, na-arụ ọrụ na ikike ahụ ruo March 2011.

A bufere ya n'ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara South Africa, n'April 2011, na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche, sitere na IT Team Leader for Africa, New Entity Execution & Facilities Director, na Director Of Operations. N'ọnwa Septemba 2018, mgbe afọ iri na abụọ gachara ọrụ, na Cummins, a họpụtara ya onye isi njikwa na onye isi oche mpaghara mpaghara South Africa, na-ahụ maka mba iri na abụọ na Sub-Saharan.
